entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 3.1°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: 3.1°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Dewpoint: -5.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers near the Rockies early this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:07 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:07 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:07 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
